thread.title: Jaclyn Barker Barker
thread.title_full: Fabletics reviewed by Jaclyn Barker Barker

author: Jaclyn Barker Barker
title: Jaclyn Barker Barker
text: I had a lot of trouble trying to pick out what I really wanted because I was limited certain colors but they were not shown in the picture that they were out of stock on that item. I had trouble getting my size because of the same reason, out of stock. It has been a couple weeks since I ordered last, you would think that you would have been stocked by now. I hope that next month when I order, I will have more choices than limitations. Thank you.
